messages:
What's more exciting than the 48th Super Bowl???

Being in an Apostolic service feeling the presence of God & Rejoicing in Him!
#ilovechurch

What's more exciting than the 48th Super Bowl???

Being in an Apostolic service feeling the presence of God & Rejoicing in Him!
#ilovechurch
Heaven isnt a figment of imagination. Its nota emotion. Its not the 'Beautiful Isle of Somewhere.' Its a prepared place 4 a prepared people.

What's more exciting than the 48th Super Bowl???

Being in an Apostolic service feeling the presence of God & Rejoicing in Him!
#ilovechurch
